items.sentence: Tom loved both of the girls and they both loved him.
Tom was looking forward to going swimming with Mary.
Tom was looking forward to going shopping with Mary.
I wasn't the one who asked Tom to clean the bathtub.
Tom planted this tree on the day that Mary was born.
I don't want you to go there alone, and that's that.
Tom threw away some stuff that didn't belong to him.
Mary must've been very beautiful when she was young.
Tom and I are planning to go skating this afternoon.
Tom said that he thought that I was being insincere.
